title: Duke Quiz
Description: This quiz will test your knowledge about Duke University!

questions.question: In what city is Duke Univeristy located?
In 1924, the university changed its name to Duke University from what name?
The Duke Endowment, whose primary beneficiary is Duke University, also partially endows what university?
Which of the following is the namesake of the University's primary architect?
How many Final Fours has Duke played in?
